tech_news.title: Free update for Mario Kart World lets you race as a team in Knockout Tour - Nintendo
tech_news.description: Available now. Only for the Nintendo Switch 2 system.

tech_news.title: Donkey Kong Bananza 3.1.0 update out now, patch notes - Nintendo Everything
tech_news.description: Yet another Nintendo game has received an update tonight, which is Donkey Kong Bananza with version 3.1.0. This patch is fairly small in scale. Polish is now supported, and some unspecified issues have been fixed. For the full patch notes, continue on below. …

tech_news.title: Pokemon Legends Z-A 2.0.1 update out now, patch notes - Nintendo Everything
tech_news.description: Pokemon Legends Z-A has now released a new version 2.0.1 update, and here are the official patch notes.

tech_news.title: Millions of people imperiled through sign-in links sent by SMS - Ars Technica
tech_news.description: Even well-known services with millions of users are exposing sensitive data.

tech_news.title: Alex Brings His High-Flying Action to Street Fighter™ 6 as He Steps Into the Ring on March 17 - Games Press
tech_news.description: Alex brings his own brand of stylishly clothed combat to the game.

tech_news.title: Apple plans to make Siri an AI chatbot, report says - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: Siri could look more like ChatGPT than its current state as an integrated feature across Apple products.

tech_news.title: 'Call the Police': Woman Goes Into Gas Station Bathroom. Then She Gives The Mirror A Closer Look - Motor1.com
tech_news.description: A woman went to a gas station bathroom. The position of the mirrors made her wonder if she was being watched. How can you tell if a mirror is two-way?

tech_news.title: Apple is reportedly working on an AirTag-sized AI wearable - The Verge
tech_news.description: Apple is working on an AI wearable the size of an AirTag, according to a report from The Information. The device will reportedly pick up a user’s surroundings with two cameras and three microphones.
